archimate:BusinessRole.name: Data Controller
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: As defined by the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the natural or legal person, public authority, agency, or other body which, alone or jointly with others, determines the purposes and means of the processing of Personal Data.
